public static android.graphics.Bitmap getCroppedPhoto(@NonNull

        NOTE: This is a temporary method.
        Parameters:
        photo - source photo. Not null.
        context - context to run first analyzer
        Returns:
        smallest cropped photo containing all TextBlocks

      • analyzeTicket

        public OcrTicket analyzeTicket(@NonNull
                               ImageProcessor imgProc,
                               boolean advanced)
        Extract a Ticket from an ImageProcessor loaded with a bitmap.
        Parameters:
        imgProc - ImagePreprocessor with at least an image assigned (corners can be set manually).
        Returns:
        Ticket containing any information found, and/or a list of errors occurred.

      • analyzeTicket

        public void analyzeTicket(@NonNull
                          ImageProcessor imgProc,
                          boolean advanced,
                          @NonNull
                          com.annimon.stream.function.Consumer<OcrTicket> ticketCb)
        Asynchronous version of analyzeTicket(imgProc). The ticket is passed by the callback parameter.
        Parameters:
        imgProc - ImagePreprocessor
        ticketCb - Callback
